snippet: Kobe Bryant passed former teammate Shaquille O’Neal to move into fifth place on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list in a loss to the Philadelphia 76ers.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers defeat Los Angeles Lakers, 95-90; Lakers guard Kobe Bryant moves into fifth place on the NBA’s career scoring list; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant passed former teammate Shaquille O’Neal to move into fifth place on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list in a loss to the Philadelphia 76ers.

headline.seo: Lakers’ Bryant Passes O’Neal for Fifth Place on Career Scoring List in Loss to 76ers
headline.main: Lakers Lose on Big Night for Bryant
headline.print_headline: Milestone For Bryant, But No Win
